mapper.insert: INSERT INTO linker.cardlist (p_id, u_id, title) VALUES (#{p_id}, #{u_id}, #{title})
mapper.select: SELECT cl.p_id , cl.id AS cl_id , cl.u_id AS cl_u_id , cl.title AS cl_title , cl.cdate AS cl_cdate , cl.udate AS cl_udate , cl.ps_id AS cl_ps_id , c.id AS c_id , c.u_id AS c_u_id , c.title AS c_title , CASE WHEN c.content IS NULL THEN 0 WHEN c.content = '' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS content , c.cdate AS c_cdate , c.udate AS c_udate , c.ps_id AS c_ps_id , uhc.status , uhc.u_id AS uhc_u_id , reply , file FROM linker.cardlist cl LEFT JOIN linker.card c ON cl.id = c.cl_id LEFT JOIN linker.user_has_card uhc ON cl.p_id = uhc.p_id AND c.id = uhc.c_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT c_id, count(*) AS reply FROM linker.c_reply GROUP BY c_id) AS r ON c.id = r.c_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT c_id, count(*) AS file FROM linker.c_file GROUP BY c_id) AS f ON c.id = f.c_id WHERE cl.p_id = #{p_id} AND cl.ps_id = 1 ORDER BY c_id ASC
SELECT id , p_id , u_id , title , ps_id , udate FROM linker.cardlist WHERE ps_id = #{ps_id} AND p_id = #{p_id} ORDER BY udate DESC
